Articles.Content:
MechJeb2


If anyone is familiar with the cfg files of MechJeb2 files please help. I need to unlock it so 
I can use it from the start in science Mod. I have done this in the past but it seems. as i have 
forgotten how to do it or the files have changed, or both lol.

The config files that i have found are...

    en-us.cfg            This looks like it supports various language

    MechJebNoCommandPod.cfg        This looks like it sets the locks in sandbox and career/ science

    part.cfg            This also shows the Locks along with the mods specific's.

    LandingSites.cfg        Location of landing sites

I have changed MechJebNoCommandPod.cfg and part.cfg in all the spots but it does not work.

from %MechJebModuleSmartASS { %unlockTechs = flightControl } 

to %MechJebModuleSmartASS { %unlockTechs = start }

and   // --- editor parameters ---
    TechRequired = start
    entryCost = 15000
    cost = 750
    category = none
    subcategory = 0
    title = MechJeb Features- Rover Autopilot

Thanks for any help
I looked thru all my cfg files and did not see anything I missed. Not sure what you mean buy setting. SORRY
